name: NSStringDrawingContext
desc: An object that manages metrics for drawing attributed strings.

items.name: var minimumScaleFactor: CGFloat
items.desc: The scale factor that determines the smallest font size to use during drawing.

items.name: var actualScaleFactor: CGFloat
items.desc: The actual scale factor that the system applied to the font during drawing.

items.name: var totalBounds: CGRect
items.desc: The most recent bounding rectangle that the system used to draw the string.
